channel.title: Need help with my client (Got two questions)
channel.description: I have a couple of questions about mine client. 1-I've seen somebody ask this question before in another topic but I haven't seen I forgot where it was soz.. How do I get start up music on my client? 2-The sprites in my client I've edited them and saved them as the right files (.jag or .png) and when I compile and close the client and run the client back up again the pictures come out so stupid? why is that? I'll post pics later because right now I busy [b]EDIT:[/b] [IMG]http://i180.photobucket.com/albums/x303/mystickid2k6/msclient3.jpg[/img] that is the pic and I may have taken a couple of the Ice Realm client Sprites for the chatbox because I thought they were awsome!)

item.title: Need help with my client (Got two questions)
item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

Well I’ll upload the files into a fold and when your done you think you can send em’ back to me? I just want to send these pics because I don’t want anyone else to get a hold of the client you know…? and you want the .jag files or the .png files?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with my client (Got two questions)

item.title: Need help with my client (Got two questions)
item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

I have a couple of questions about mine client.
1-I’ve seen somebody ask this question before in another topic but I haven’t seen I forgot where it was soz…
How do I get start up music on my client?
2-The sprites in my client I’ve edited them and saved them as the right files (.jag or .png) and when I compile and close the client and run the client back up again the pictures come out so stupid? why is that?
I’ll post pics later because right now I busy
EDIT:

msclient3.jpg783×535

that is the pic and I may have taken a couple of the Ice Realm client Sprites for the chatbox because I thought they were awsome!)
